attributes.review: After seeing the man in the app, my dog went into cardiac arrest and died. It is clearly disturbing, terrifying, and unsafe to the public. I strongly believe it should not continue to be available.

attributes.review: first off lets start by saying america isnt even great. and it says “keep america great”. but its not... so theirs lies. but it also stole my dog and killed my turtle. they seen the disturbing pics of that cheeto and they just died. it also cracked my phone screen. so if u want to keep ur pets and have a good phone screen rate this app 1 star and dont download it. its super distrubing.

attributes.review: This app has scared me for the rest of my live. I opened it to see a horrifying rotten Cheeto on my screen I could smell the horrifying smell trough my screen which has not left my nose sense.
He ate my dino nuggets and would not let my buy more and then ate my fries and hamburger and then when I tried to give food to a homeless person he ate it
